post_title.text: Andrew: An Artificial Network for Digital Recording Event Windows

post_preview_description.text: A sound-object labelling machine learning model for use as an Audacity script. Uses VGGish for feature extraction and a Pytorch N-way classifier neural network for training.

siteMetadata.title: Northwestern University
siteMetadata.description: Next Generation Content Production Tools for People with Vision Impairments.
